column3: “This is a great strain. Effects are very powerful. Leaves you feeling great. Helped me wanna get up and do something. Didn't leave me too hungry.”

“I love the cerebral effects and how it makes you feel joyful and creative. I love how it took my worries and obsessions away from me. I however didn't like the insane munchies and dry mouth it gave me but other than that this is a chill blend. I'd definitely recommend it if your anxious and depressed”
“Smoked a bowl of this before heading to a friends house one night, made me feel amazing. Didn't get any tiredness and felt extremely social and talkative. Good stuff :)”
“Definitely a good high, I agree with most the other reviews, I got the munchies HARD! Lol Good smell, nice tasting strain.”

“This happens to be one of my favorite strains. It never fails to get me started at the beginning of the day. Gives me the boost needed to make it through the day. Keeps pain at bay while keeping you moving. I wouldn't recommend it for beginners due to the extreme energy rush. Some may feel an increase in heartbeat due to its potency. But it's great for veteran smokers like myself. Once you get used to it, you'll stop...”

“I'm impressed with this strain. It keeps me pretty chill while also helping me focus. There were some munchies but they weren't overwhelming. It's a smooth smoke. The buds smell amazing. Would recommend.”
“Nice strain. The high rolls in fairly quick and nice. After a time it rolls out. Felt contented. I had dry eyes and the munchies but that’s minor. Great wind-down after the workday.”
“Nice thick nugs, amazing smell. Immediate cerebral high. Eyes kinda heavy. Getting higher as I type this review. Definitely recommended.”
“This is by far one of my favourite strains. I let all of my friends try this one and they all love its smell, taste, and the way it burns so nice and sweet!”
“Very Good Strain!”
“This strain was amazing it gave me that energy I needed and the taste was great. Would recommend if you looking to socialize with friends or a day out.”
“Nice strain. The high rolls in fairly quick and nice. After a time it rolls out. Felt contented. I had dry eyes and the munchies but that’s minor. Great wind-down after the workday.”
“Nice thick nugs, amazing smell. Immediate cerebral high. Eyes kinda heavy. Getting higher as I type this review. Definitely recommended.”
“phenomenal stuff! super happy and euphoric feel.”
“Great strain for being functional and social. No anxiety, no major munchies, no sleepiness. Overall just happy, mellow, energized”

“Recently been trying some sativas since I usually prefer indicas, which isn’t very helpful for being functional in the daytime. I have a pretty high tolerance but a couple cones of this stuff made me almost uncomfortably high. I have anxiety and too much can make me feel and act a little paranoid but I’m not too worried compared to it’s other benefits. Great for doing stuff or doing nothing, depends how much you smok...”
“My new fav sativa. Packs a punch but leaves you feeling lovely.”
“Really potent daytime weed.”
“This is a beautiful strain to grow and smoke. Super frosty, dense buds. packs a clear-headed punch. Can induce anxiety.”
“haven't tried it, looking forward....”
